sentences.sContent: She skipped lunch in order to go shopping.
sentences.sCn: 为了去购物，她没有吃午饭。

sentences.sContent: Williams skipped the game to be with his wife in the hospital.
sentences.sCn: 威廉斯为了在医院里陪他妻子而放弃了这场比赛。

trans.tranCn: 跳；跳过，略过，漏过；不出席
trans.tranOther: to not do something that you usually do or that you should do
